definition: to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-
eye/small hole/crux (of a matter)/CL:隻|只[zhi1],雙|双[shuang1]/classifier for big hollow things (wells, stoves, pots etc)
cigarette or pipe tobacco/CL:根[gen1]/smoke/mist/vapour/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/tobacco plant/(of the eyes) to be irritated by smoke
surname Yun/abbr. for Yunnan Province 雲南省|云南省[Yun2 nan2 Sheng3]

sentences.english: In the final analysis, most of life's joys are transitory.
sentences.chinese: 歸根結底，塵世間的歡樂大多是過眼煙雲，轉瞬即逝。

sentences.english: Although many of the examples are obviously dated, their lessons are timeless.
sentences.chinese: 儘管很多往事已如過眼煙雲，但他們的感悟永恆。

sentences.english: As the years flew by , so did the images.
sentences.chinese: 時光飛逝，畫面也如過眼煙雲。

sentences.english: The joy or sorrow, impetuous but some ephemeral.
sentences.chinese: 浮躁的歡喜或悲哀，不過是一些過眼煙雲。
